text:
Sec 13(g) requires common control for an establishment to be considered
part of a conglomerate (see FOH 25o00). WH will consider common control under
Sec 3(r) to be the same for purposes of Sec 13(g).
html: Sec 13(g) requires common control for an establishment to be considered part of a conglomerate (see FOH 25o00). WH will consider common control under Sec 3(r) to be the same for purposes of Sec 13(g).
